accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for use without restrictions. The volume is handwritten in German and a thorough command of the language is necessary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The volume is the gift of Dr. Isabel Taliaferro Voehringer.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Reverend Paul A. Menzel was a minister of St. John's Evangelical Lutheran Church. His son-in-law (?), Dr. B. Taliaferro, and granddaughter (?), Dr. Isabel Taliaferro, were graduates of the Medical College of Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection is a book of Reverend Paul A. Menzel's records (one item) of the activities within St. John's Evangelical Lutheran Church, of which he was pastor. The volume covers the period 1755-1766 and is handwritten in German.
